tool_description: Powerful tool designed to provide comprehensive access to data from Meta's extensive ad library (Facebook, Instagram, Messenger, Audience Network).
name: Meta Ad Library

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://meta-ad-library.p.rapidapi.com/countries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "meta-ad-library.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://meta-ad-library.p.rapidapi.com/countries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "meta-ad-library.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
